title: Women's Health Information Act of 1993
content: Women's Health Information Act of 1993 - Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to establish an Interagency Committee on Health Communications to provide advice to the Secretary on developing, overseeing, and coordinating Federal health promotion and education activities, including such activities within the Public Health Service. Requires the Committee to give priority to activities concerning women's health. Provides for the establishment of a Clearinghouse on Women's Health to compile and disseminate information concerning women's health.
